ygData.subject: Re: Soft Cap on Resists (was: Patch Message)
ygData.msgSnippet: So are we in agreement that this should be part of the balancing issues for high level bards?  I think that this is an excellent point that should be brought
ygData.messageBody:
So are we in agreement that this should be part of the balancing
issues for high level bards? I think that this is an excellent point
that should be brought up. At the same time we can confirm if the
soft cap is truth or rumor. That is of course if the balance
discussions are still open.

Not it. LOL!

~Beatdrop Battledrum


> there is no threat. this is why scaling resists to 255 would make
bards more
> useful and desirable in high level raids. even if all members of
the raid can get
> to 175 with equipment and cleric/druid/whatever buffs they would be
hard pressed
> to get to 255 without a bard.
